 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַת‎</span>] **verb** ==fall upon, startle, terrify== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***come*** or ***happen suddenly***, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעִת‎</span> Hiph\`il ***startle***; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּעֵת‎</span> Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aph\`el) — 

**Niph\`al** (late prose) ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְעַת‎</span> [[1Chr.21.30|1Chr 21:30]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְעָ֑ת‎</span> [[Esth.7.6|Esth 7:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְעַתִּי‎</span> [[Dan.8.17|Dan 8:17]] — ***be terrified***, absolute [[Dan.8.17|Dan 8:17]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מפני‎</span> [[1Chr.21.30|1Chr 21:30]]; [[Esth.7.6|Esth 7:6]]. **Pi\`el** (mostly in poetry) ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּעֲתָ֑תְנִי‎</span> [[Isa.21.4|Isa 21:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבִעֲתַ֫תּוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.16.14|1Sam 16:14]] 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּעֲתֻהוּ‎</span> [[Job.18.11|Job 18:11]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבַעֵת‎</span> [[Job.13.11|Job 13:11]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבַעֲתַ֑נִּי‎</span> [[Job.9.34|Job 9:34]]; [[Job.13.21|Job 13:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבַעֲתֶ֑ךָּ‎</span> [[Job.33.7|Job 33:7]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבַעֲתַ֑נּי‎</span> [[Job.7.14|Job 7:14]] 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְבַעֲתוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.18.5|Ps 18:5]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְבַעֲתֻנִי‎</span> [[2Sam.22.5|2Sam 22:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְבַעֲתֻהוּ‎</span> [[Job.3.5|Job 3:5]]; [[Job.15.24|Job 15:24]] — 

**1.** ***fall upon*** [[1Sam.16.14|1Sam 16:14]]; [[1Sam.16.15|1Sam 16:15]] (only here in prose); ***overwhelm*** [[Job.3.5|Job 3:5]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקח‎</span> v[[Job.3.6|Job 3:6]]) [[Job.9.34|Job 9:34]]; [[Job.13.11|Job 13:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פחד נפל על‎</span>) v[[Job.13.21|Job 13:21]] (compare \|\|) [[Job.15.24|Job 15:24]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תקף‎</span>) [[Job.18.11|Job 18:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הפיץ‎</span>) [[Job.33.7|Job 33:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כבד על‎</span>) [[Isa.21.4|Isa 21:4]] ***assail*** [[Ps.18.5|Ps 18:5]] = [[2Sam.22.5|2Sam 22:5]]. 

**2.** ***terrify*** [[Job.7.14|Job 7:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חתת‎</span>).
